title: CANCELED | Member Lecture: El Greco—Ambition and Defiance
title_display: CANCELED | Member Lecture: El Greco—Ambition and Defiance
hero_caption: El Greco (Domenikos Theotokopoulos). The Assumption of the Virgin (detail), 1577–79. Gift of Nancy Atwood Sprague in memory of Albert Arnold Sprague.
short_description: Join curatorial assistant Jena Carvana as she traces the iconic career of the artist known simply as El Greco, whose work is featured in the major exhibition El Greco: Ambition and Defiance.
description:
In the interest of the health and safety of our visitors, guest speakers, performers, and staff, we are canceling all events through May 10. We hope to reschedule this program and will let all current registrants know of the new date as soon as it’s set. 

Please review other precautionary measures the museum is taking due to COVID-19.

Join curatorial assistant Jena Carvana as she traces the iconic career of the artist known simply as El Greco, whose work is featured in the major exhibition El Greco: Ambition and Defiance.

For additional member programs, please visit the member programs calendar.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to email access@artic.edu or call (312) 499-4111 as far in advance as possible.
